definitions.text: give a certain impression or have a certain outward aspect
examples: This appears to be a very difficult problem
They appeared like people who had not eaten or slept for a long time

definitions.text: seem to be true, probable, or apparent
examples: It seems that he is very gifted
It appears that the weather in California is very bad
There seems no reason to go ahead with the project now

definitions.text: appear to one's own mind or opinion
examples: I seem to be misunderstood by everyone
I can't seem to learn these Chinese characters
